description: The homeland of the Darknuts to the west was frequently victim to high temperatures and desert-like heat waves. Years of breeding and hybridizing various plants had led them to create Vines that could withstand temperatures not normally ideal for the plants.
tooltip: The homeland of the Darknuts to the west was frequently victim to high temperatures and desert-like heat waves. Years of breeding and hybridizing various plants had led them to create Vines that could withstand temperatures not normally ideal for the plants. (Vineyard's passive food generation increases by +1)
